summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4873 for the improvement of 8th Avenue North from Harrison Street to Westlake Avenue North and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55942, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
